CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Nokia_s_Ability_To_Win__c , "No"),0, IF(ISPICKVAL( Nokia_s_Ability_To_Win__c , "Questionable"), 0.25, IF(ISPICKVAL( Nokia_s_Ability_To_Win__c , "Partly"), 0.5, IF(ISPICKVAL( Nokia_s_Ability_To_Win__c , "Mainly"), 0.75, IF(ISPICKVAL( Nokia_s_Ability_To_Win__c , "Fully"), 1,0)))))
CustomField.label: Nokia's Ability Weight
